hero_headline: Interactive short-form video for EPI-USE Labs’ website
hero_subheadline: Give your buyers - HR teams - a more engaging, self-guided video experience around EPI-USE Labs’ website with ReelFlow.
headline_what_is_reelflow: Interactive, short-form video for a better buyer experience
subheadline_what_is_reelflow: Most B2B websites are static, text-heavy and outdated; the opposite of what modern buyers are craving today.
Benefit_1_subheading_what_is_reelflow: Interactive video to help visitors find exactly what they need during independent research.
Benefit_2_subheading_what_is_reelflow: Show the people behind your brand through authentic video that creates trust during crucial research phases.
Benefit_3_subheading_what_is_reelflow: Create self-guided experiences that respect how modern buyers research, improving conversion quality.
fit_headline: Why do we think ReelFlow  is right for EPI-USE Labs?
Fit_subheadline: You are already active with video on social media, plus you are invested in website performance - but there is a big opportunity to improve!
Fit_1_subheading: You are posting between 3-4 YouTube videos per month, getting some great engagement.
Fit_2_subheading: With Hotjar and HubSpot Conversations on site, it’s clear you value strong website engagement.
Fit_3_heading: Your video strategy isn’t carrying over to your site
Fit_3_subheading: Over 5% of traffic is from socials (above B2B avg) but they bounce in ~33s and view <2 pages.
